CustomField.description: Indicates the roles that should only be able to create the lead pass. If create lead pass is true and this field is populated then only these specific roles belonging to a profile will be able to access the feature. If create lead pass is true and this field is blank then that indicates the entire profile has access.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the roles that should only be able to create the lead pass. If create lead pass is true and this field is populated then only these specific roles belonging to a profile will be able to access the feature. If create lead pass is true and this field is blank then that indicates the entire profile has access.
CustomField.label: Create Lead Pass Roles
